query: /prompt-engineer audit You are a helpful assistant that answers questions about our product. Be concise and accurate. If you don't know, say so.
expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Mode B: Analyze in report-only mode based on 'audit' keyword
Agent auto-detects the pasted text as an existing prompt (contains 'You are...' role definition)
Agent performs model-class detection and asks user for target model since prompt is generic
Agent produces diagnostic scorecard with total score out of 25
Agent applies four-lens analysis without modifying the prompt
Agent identifies anti-patterns (likely: vague instructions, missing output format, no injection hardening)
Agent does NOT propose or apply changes (report-only mode)
Agent recommends full Analyze if fixes needed, and Mode D (Evaluate)
